title: Two Black Comedians Sue Police Over Search at Atlanta Airport
description: Eric André and Clayton English said they were two of hundreds of Black travelers who have been stopped and questioned by officers just as they were about to board flights.
dc:creator: April Rubin
media:description: The comedians Clayton English, center, and Eric André, right, speak with one of their lawyers, Allegra Lawrence-Hardy, outside the federal courthouse in Atlanta this month.
